title.text: Machine Translation for Crimean Tatar to Turkish

abstractContent.text: In this paper a machine translation system for Crimean Tatar to Turkish is presented.
To our knowledge this is the first Machine Translation system made available for public use for Crimean Tatar, and the first such system released as free and open source software.
The system was built using Apertium 1 , a free and open source machine translation system, and is currently unidi-rectional from Crimean Tatar to Turkish.
We describe our translation system, evaluate it on parallel corpora and compare its performance with a Neural Machine Translation system, trained on the limited amount of corpora available.

introductionContent.text: This paper presents a Free/Open-Source prototype shallow-transfer rule-based machine translation system between Crimean Tatar and Turkish.
